text.tspan: Child mortality vs. average years of schooling for women, 2020
The child mortality rate is the share of children who die before reaching the age of five.
Average years of education for 15-64 years female youth and adults
Data source: United Nations Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (2024) and other sources
